Package src

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
src.Investment
src.Stock
public class Stock extends Investment
The Stock class represents a stock investment. It includes details such as the symbol, name, quantity, price, book value, payment received, and gain on investment. It also provides methods to update these details.

This class is designed to manage stock investments by providing methods to buy and sell shares, and to calculate the book value and gain on investment.

Note: The commission fee for buying or selling stocks is defined as a constant.
